FuncDef: This command configures the maximum size for each Frame Relay scheduling class queue for this profile.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number, in ms, of the available link or bundle rate. Values-1 to 1000.

ExtraInfo: Default: max-queue-size 10 - class 0max-queue-size 50 - class 1max-queue-size 150 - class 2max-queue-size 750 - class 3
